game.name: Mosquitoes and zombies
game.shortDescription: You will play as a knight who rides his horse to meet the enemies, and destroys them on his way, using his sharp sword!
game.shortDescriptionEn: You will play as a knight who rides his horse to meet the enemies, and destroys them on his way, using his sharp sword!

reviewHighlights.text: [h1]Medi-evil[/h1] I'm the horse of this nameless knight and I don't understand what is going on in this stupid endless runner. Ofc there's no base st...
Great runner, with good graphics, liked the game design
